name.description: The name of the Disk Encryption Set. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: Specifies the name of the Resource Group where the Disk Encryption Set should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the Azure Region where the Disk Encryption Set exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

key_vault_key_id.description: Specifies the URL to a Key Vault Key (either from a Key Vault Key, or the Key URL for the Key Vault Secret).

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the Disk Encryption Set.

type.description: The Type of Identity which should be used for this Disk Encryption Set. At this time the only possible value is `SystemAssigned`.

id.description: The ID of the Disk Encryption Set.

principal_id.description: The (Client) ID of the Service Principal.

tenant_id.description: The ID of the Tenant the Service Principal is assigned in.

create.description: Used when creating the Disk Encryption Set.

update.description: Used when updating the Disk Encryption Set.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Disk Encryption Set.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Disk Encryption Set.
